select bno, title, contents, writingTime , memberId , hit , recommend from board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: insert into board (bno, title, contents, writingTime , memberId, hit , recommend) values (Board_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{title}, #{contents}, (sysdate) , #{memberId} , 0 , 0)
